question: With reference of the Government of Indiaâ€™s various programme, what is Nirmal Gram Puuraskar?
option1: It is an incentive scheme of scholarships for the single child in families in villages
option2: It is an incentive scheme of scholarships for female sportspersons from villages who represent their States in any game.
option3: It is an incentive scheme for schools in the village for computer education
option4: It is an incentive scheme for Panchayati Raj institutions
answer: It is an incentive scheme for Panchayati Raj institutions
explanation:
Government of India launched the Nirmal Gram Puraskar (NGP) in October 2003 and gave away the first awards in 2005. NGP seeks to recognise the efforts made by PRls and institutions who have contributed significantly towards ensuring full sanitation coverage in their areas of operation.
TSC lays strong emphasis on Information, Education and communication (lEC), capacity building and hygiene education for effective behaviour change with the involvement of PRls, CBOs, NGOs, etc. Main objective is to bring sanitation to the forefront of social and political discourse for development in rural India.
